code: import actiontypes from'../actiontypes';export var addToCart=function addToCart(product){return{type:actiontypes().cart.add,payload:product};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(id){return{type:actiontypes().cart.sub,payload:id};};export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(id){return{type:actiontypes().cart.delete,payload:id};};
